casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Marcellus CATCHINGS Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 5, 2017 Laila Haswell, senior assistant public defender, in support of the petition. Rita M. Shair, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 170 Conn. App. 564 , 155 A.3d 236 (2017), is denied.

ROBINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
